website_summaries.verdict: The bathroom grab bar of choice when size is an issue. Comes in a variety of lengths for any number of shower and tub sizes.
pros: Plenty of length options to fit your specific bathroom setup
Great to mix and match different lengths if you want more than one bar
cons: Installation requires extra skill for drilling and mounting

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL RIP OFF!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A TOTAL RIPOFF. This product does not come with the securemount hardware as advertised in the description and shown in the installation video. It comes with wood screws and will only mount to studs in the wall. If you need to mount it to sheet rock, you must purchase the securemount hardware separately, at TWICE the cost of the grab bar
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Fixture for Mounting To Hollow Wall NOT Included
customer_reviews.text: The installation video with this item shows installation onto a hollow wall. The item came packaged with only the screws. No fixture was supplied to attach the mounting plate to a hollow wall. Hard to believe anything one reads or watches anymore. No mention or suggested accessory for the fixture required to mount on a hollow wall. Moen, bad. Bad, Bad, Bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jusme

customer_reviews.title: Great shower bar, crappy included screws
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking product!! Great price!! This product was very easy to install. The only thing I did not like was the screws it came with. I stripped 3 screws. I ended up going to Lowe's and buying better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It states that it is "SecureMount design for easy, secure installation
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a decent product. The product description on Amazon though for this product is deceptive. It states that it is "SecureMount design for easy, secure installation," but fails to state that the SecureMount hardware is not included, and in fact, it a separate item and charge that is actually more expensive than the grab bar, itself. At the very least, to not be deceptive, it should clearly state that the SecureMount hardware must be purchased separately. Nevertheless, I installed the grab bar vertically without using the SecureMount hardware and was able to install it directly into a stud, so it is very firmly attached to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: MAV

customer_reviews.title: They break too easily when trying to tighten them
customer_reviews.text: The bar itself is OK, but what the real problem is the screws. They break too easily when trying to tighten them. What a fatal flaw for an Item meant to help people presumably having balance issues to have a screw head that can break. Shame on moen for this. Anyone who gets this , please buy different fasteners. Wall dog screws or similar. Its pointless to have a good handle that cant be hooked securely to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-an Mack

customer_reviews.title: Rusting
customer_reviews.text: This was installed about six weeks ago in a newly tiled shower and I noticed today two rust spots on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Gary from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Very secure and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely do not understand the nay sayers for this product. I am an engineer and the support provided is outstanding. Several say you need the secure mount kit. Try using a stud finder! When mounted to the wall studs, this is an outstanding product. We have used this reliably for about a year, with no corrosion, no stability issues, and no issues with separation from drywall. I highly recommend this bar. We specifically used this in an enclosed toilet closet off our master bath. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: BE WARNED! - SecureMounts are NOT INCLUDED with the bars.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, however i have to take a star off due to the price, which is not what you think it is... The product description says "SecureMount design for easy, secure installation". Be warned, SecureMounts are NOT INCLUDED with the bar. The cost of the SecureMounts are as much or More than the bar itself ! The Mounts are $17 EACH! So be careful. Your cost projection may be double what you think it is.
customer_reviews.author: Just Lil' Ol' Me

customer_reviews.title: Moen is not a leader in bath products
customer_reviews.text: The bars do a great job of keeping my husband safe, after being installed by our local contractor. However, after 2 weeks of use during a morning shower bath, short and sweet one of the bars is rusting. I just do not understand how a seasoned company like Moen sells this kind of inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety Addition
customer_reviews.text: This rail is far more solid than I expected when I opened the package and saw how light it was. I was very careful to mount it (well, my grandson did most of that, under guidance) so that all the mounting screws were set deeply into the shower framing and the effort was well worth it - It is like a rock! Having had my hip replaced - twice this year the rail was the difference between showering and settling for using baby wipes. I have no fear of it failing should my balance waver. The 24" length made possible using a creative mounting angle (diagonal) necessary because of the design of the shower's molded in shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Escape

customer_reviews.title: screws are wrong size installing it in my shower
customer_reviews.text: Moen 8724 Home 24-Inch Bathroom Grab Bar, Stainless was not easy to install. My shower is made of PVC and is hollow once you get past the PVC and then there is a really hard wall that my drill bit could not penetrate. The screws that were included are too long and cannot be used for installation. What I really needed was short screws with big round heads but I did not have any so I had to use some small round head screws that are too small to securely mount the grab bar. In summary: Be prepared to go to the hardware store and buy some screws if you buy this from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brent TraftonTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: Great bars, bad mount screws strip out
customer_reviews.text: Reason 3 stars, these are great grab bars,the best. But, they provide you with junk mounting screws. Phillip's head, that strip out. Terrible screws. I've got these bars all over my place, being disabled, I use them alot. I've even had a professional come install some. And the screws, just throw away. Every handyman knows Phillip's screws are junk and strip out. These are cheap metal, and will strip before you can get one screw part way set. You must use your own screws or go buy some. Other than this issue, these are the best grab bars .
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: small diameter rod
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of ADA approved hand holds before this and they were of a larger diameter. This smaller handle is much harder to grip securely. I am 6"2". So large hands. To me the small diameter is not as good. It is OK just to hold to, but in a slip/fall situation the ability to hold on could be the thing that keeps you from getting injured. Take note that my installation is vertical. In the horizontal position it does not make much difference on gripping securely. Having a large diameter vertical rod feels much more secure holding it.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Textured handrail, cover over the mounting screws, good price
customer_reviews.text: I like that these steel grab bars have a very fine texture over the parts that your hands would touch. I think that when wet, the texture gives me a better grip. Other grab bars may have a coating such as nickel (which is toxic if ingested)... which I suppose are fine, but I believe stainless steel to be stronger and will stand up to scrubbing better than coated metals. And steel is not as toxic as nickel. I see that the vendor priced these 24" bars at a lower price than their shorter grab bars, maybe only for a short time, so I feel I got a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mehetabelle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STURDY HANDICAP BAR!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help my brother with getting up out of bed and giving him stability to stand and get in his chair. You have to mount it to a wall or somewhere secure to give the person the help they need. We are currently making a wooden pole that will be approximately 3" wide that will fasten at the ceiling and floor to mount a handicap bar near his recliner. We believe it will give him the much needed support in getting up and in his electric chair. Stop him from loosing balance and falling. Great item and a reasonable price. Good quality for sure. We recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SeriousBob

customer_reviews.title: Well built good length should last a very long time
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower installed grab bar. I installed it at a 45 degree angle for an older gentleman living in some apartments that I do contractor maintenance at
customer_reviews.author: Brent Vogl

customer_reviews.title: Easy and secure Installation
customer_reviews.text: I am a 77 year old female with physical challenges . After reading the reviews I was very surprised to find this bar so easy to install. I installed the 32 inch bar vertically beside my bathtub to feel more secure when getting in and out. I did not have any trouble with the screws provided stripping out as reported by others. I used my cordless drill to drill pilot holes as instructed before installing the screws. Even with my lack of strength this installation was a no brainer. Great product that I will buy again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great handle bar for the money
customer_reviews.text: I installed this grab bar on my elderly mother's shower and it work just fine. It was easy to install; no major issues. It appears to be very light but once you mount on the wall (with all of its six screws) it feels very sturdy. I did not trust the installation gear that came with it. I thought the plastic anchors were too flimsy and the screws too long. I ended up, like many other reviewers, buying a whole set of anchors and (shorter) screws. I was very pleased with the overall result. Now I feel that my mom is much safer every time she steps into her shower.
customer_reviews.author: norbac

customer_reviews.title: Great  grab bar for the shower.
customer_reviews.text: I was scheduled for total knee replacement surgery and needed something to provide stability in the tub/shower. Stepping into and out of the shower is just full of danger for a person who has lost (temporarily) their stability. I purchased these grab bars and install them prior to my surgery. BEST purchase I've made in recent time. I would recommend these for ANYONE who has stability issues, for any reason. If you're not a "handy man" type person, you will need to have someone install them; however, installation is straightforward. Took me about 25 minutes to install both.
customer_reviews.author: EGH923

customer_reviews.title: Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of bars to find the very ones I wanted. It was described as "Chrome finish is highly reflective for a mirror-like look..." but what arrived was a satin finish. I even paid extra for this bar that is shorter than some others by the same mfr. that were not advertised as polished. That makes sense...to polish stainless steel takes more time and labor than it does to produce a brushed finish. So I paid extra...to be disappointed. Other than that, its a great bar (as long as you are willing to take whatever finish they decide to send you).
customer_reviews.author: FredToo

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it should
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it should, hardware provided worked out good. I put 2x6 pieces of wood in the wall behind the tile to screw into and it is holding really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived a couple days late, no explanation given. When I opened the box found that the grab bar was loose inside a very oversized box. it must have bounced around a lot because it was dented at one end. Luckily I managed to bend back into shape and used it as is. Once mounted the bar itself is fantastic. Looks Great with a solid feel and the mounting system works well with wall studs. The mounts are circular and welded to the bar so you can mount at any angle. it comes with 6 screws and tells you what size hole to pre-drill. if the package was better and the bar not damaged, would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bars - my father had an accident and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bars - my father had an accident and we added these in the bathroom, by the shower and also outside where he comes into the house. Easy to install and does the trick. He asked me if I had any more and I told him I could get more - why? He said one or two more and he could swing through the house...lol He's feeling better! I feel better knowing he has these to help him if he gets lightheaded.
customer_reviews.author: S. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Secure mount hardware NOT included
customer_reviews.text: The problem was the video and the product description both talked about the Secure mount design hardware, however the secure mount hardware was not included. Nowhere did it say secure mount hardware not included. It should have at least had a link that said “buy together” or specifically stated the hardware was not included. Not even the reviews stated it. So, here’s for the rest of you that might make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Abarry

customer_reviews.title: Well built and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built grab bar that supports up to 500lbs and is ADA compliant. The corrosion resistant stainless steel construction can't be beat for longevity. It also has a concealed screw design with a quality finish you can feel. The hardware included is less than optimal but as long as you screw them into a stud, they're fine. On the wall without studs, my husband screwed in a piece of 2x4x1 wood with longer screws and then used the provided product screws to attach to it. They held my husband fine (6'4"/260 lbs) in testing. They look fabulous in my parents' master bath room and have been a wonderful help to them using the toliet safely.
customer_reviews.author: Dartfest

customer_reviews.title: solid and works
customer_reviews.text: only issue i have with it and all others i seen that sell (all same flaw) they dont make them 16 o.c for studs in the wall. i would NEVER mount this with studs. so i used this up and down to hit stud, i would have liked to go sideways, that being said, they all have this design flaw from what i looked at
customer_reviews.author: anika

customer_reviews.title: Good product good value.
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent value at under $30. It installed easily in less than a half hour. I have a lot of varied construction experience. Those with less experience will likely take longer and have more challenges. This is due to experience level of the installer, not a product defect. Also consider that the strength depends on proper installation on a sound surface. When properly installed this will perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Rlambertson

customer_reviews.title: Should have done this before the wife fell
customer_reviews.text: I screwed mine into the wall for a better hold. The hardest part was finding the studs. They have multiple predrilled holes that allow for different angles depending upon where the studs are. One is set level but the other had to be set at a slight angle to hit the studs right. Both are very strong and hold all the weight and force we have put on them. Kept my 250lbs from falling when I slipped and grabbed it as I started to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Quality stainless steel grab bar at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: A solid grab bar with Moen quality. If properly mounted into solid wood using the included stainless steel wood screws, this bar is as solid and secure as they come. A great safety addition in any area where stability and security of movement is needed such as bathrooms, doorways, and other locations around the home where potential slip or elevation changes are present. A plus: they are far from ugly too!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, Safer To Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a tiled tub/shower wall. Knew it would be risky having to drill through the wall tile into the studs, but we bought the proper bit and went slowly and carefully, without any mishaps. Provides a firm grip (has a slightly rough finish for better grip); the diameter of the bar is just right for the hand (not too fat, not too skinny) and it feels very solid and secure, properly installed. We're glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with SecureMount anchors
customer_reviews.text: Even though video shows them, description implies it comes with and Q&A says it comes with SecureMount anchors, it does not. They need to be purchased separately. This needs to be made clear in the description.
customer_reviews.author: PaulR

customer_reviews.title: Work perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3, a 24" and 2 32" bars. They are quite easy to install if you're at all hand, just make sure you have the right tools, especially when installing them on tiled shower walls. Screws are supplied but these are only for fastening to studs or backing cross braces. I bought good drywall anchors for my installation making the bars very solidly mounted. Before you order these read the description and spec sheet so you won't have any surprises.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fengler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The grab bar is SOLID stainless steel. Replacing it was a breeze - the screws fit perfectly in the wall where the other grab bar was positioned for 10 years. Ironically - 10 years ago we installed a more expensive grab bar - yet in time it failed. The grab bar we replaced was layered with a plastic looking coating that eventually peeled off. We are very pleased with this new solid stainless steel grab bar. Should have paid less 10 years ago for a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: hawkman1958

customer_reviews.title: Soft mounting screws
customer_reviews.text: Moen makes an excellent grab bar but packages it with soft mounting screws. The head on one screw became completely rounded and the heads on the other five began to strip. I used a new, correctly sized screw bit. I was unable to get thru to Moen’s product support after several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Janx

customer_reviews.title: Supplied Screws are Useless Junk
customer_reviews.text: The bar appears to be fine, but the screws were of such poor quality they would go in 1/2 way before stripping the heads out. This required removal with vice grips and a trip to the hardware store to buy replacement screws. All in all, a huge pain in the you know what. If you purchase this, do yourself a favor and buy some decent screws at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Installation went well after i got the plate and i am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: this is a well made bar but i had trouble with the installation. After watching the video on website to install, i found out that the plate shown on the video was not included in the price. After contacting manufacture and amazon customer service, i had to order the additional plate to complete the install which was another 20 dollars. Installation went well after i got the plate and i am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: west4087

customer_reviews.title: This worked out perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: After a knee replacement I needed a grab bar but waned one that matched our bathroom and looked nice. This one is perfect and looks very nice. We put it on the bathroom wall across from the toilet and next to the outside of the shower. It looks very nice and feels very comfortable /sturdy to grab. It actually looks like our towel holder just a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D Morris

customer_reviews.title: Feel much safer in the shower now with this grab bar
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product and was not that hard to install. You need to make sure though that the screws go into the studs like the instructions say or I'm sure it'd rip right out of the wall at the first tug. Very nicely made and durable. I order 2 but only used 1 in the shower. Have decided to put the other in the bathroom that has a tub. (Next project.)
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy product ( if you mount it properly to a stud)  and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: After doing lots of research I purchased this bar which is by no means expensive and installed it in the guest bathroom for my mother in law. My husband said that it was easy to install if you have a stud finder and it really is sturdy and gives peace of mind and a sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled like I was
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled like I was. This product DOES NOT come with the securemount mounts. If you want those too, be prepared to spend another $40+ dollars. I was pretty pissed when I realized this.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: The bars are well finished and look structurally good,
customer_reviews.text: The installation video shows how to install using the hollow wall anchors. However the anchors have to be ordered separately and cost more than the bar itself. A little misleading. The bars are well finished and look structurally good,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent grab bar that is almost always available from amazon
customer_reviews.text: I run a handyman company and we are often installing grab bars. We have standardized on the Moen brand because they are high quality, easy to install and are rock solid. I often have to order the occasional on from Amazon because I cannot always find the required size in stock at the big box store. Prime shipping makes it easy to get in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Green Tree

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good grab bar at an unbeatable price. But one thing the listing doesn't indicate, and I took a chance when ordering it, is this unit measures 1 1/4" in diameter. I would have preferred a 1 1/2" diameter bar, but it is still a great deal. A thicker bar has a more substantial feeling in your hand, but this still gets the job done, possibly saving you from a severe fall in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Installed at a slant along the back wall of the tub.
customer_reviews.text: By installing this at a slant it provides an easy reach when sitting and also for standing. I am 78 and this is a big help for me if I want to take a full bath or steady myself while washing my lower legs and feet. Screwed it into studs so it is strong as needed. Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Condor

customer_reviews.title: Buy better screws before attempting install
customer_reviews.text: The screws provided, even with a well sized pilot hole drilled, stripped like a $100 hoo - they stripped very easily. Using cheap harbor freight bits I found were of much better quality than the screws. Maybe Moen should consider using some fine stainless instead of pot metal imitations? Other than that the bar might hold up. But if you’re risking your loved ones life on that, might think twice about buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Street

customer_reviews.title: Very trustworthy and secure - if properly installed
customer_reviews.text: If you don't know what you're doing consider finding someone who does for the installation. I screwed mine into solid wood and the hold is extremely solid. However you will need specialized fasteners for many of the surfaces found around the house - especially bathrooms - for this to be secure enough to bear the weight of an adult.
customer_reviews.author: spinteractive

customer_reviews.title: could have had better packaging. Product is exactly as shown and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast....could have had better packaging. Product is exactly as shown and is just like what you see in a bathroom in a common workplace. I have other goals in mind for my use with my other to mount this to drywall which may involve some kind of added bracket but if this were used as intended than I would say this is the right purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brindamour

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: EVERYONE should have this safety grab bar installed by the toilet and one by the shower/tub regardless of YOUR AGE or physical condition. Friends and guests also use my bathroom of course and this is excellent insurance that no one will fall. Very easy to install, be sure to securely screw into wall studs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really. People think, for the inexpensive price u pay for this high quality bar its gona come with a mounting kit for drywall? Thats why theres Lowes. Cost me bout 12 bucks for secure mounts rated at 300 lbs. 8 more bucks for carbide drills for the tiles. This is a good product. Im very satisified
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Grab Bar and Towel Bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the flimsy towel bar my landlord installed in my tiny bathroom. The towel bar kept falling down every time I touched it and the Super kept just putting the same one back up. This now acts as my towel bar and also provides me with a grab bar as I am getting less steady on my feet AND IT DOESN'T FALL DOWN! A great, inexpensive solution and it looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: PJLpurple

customer_reviews.title: In spite of people saying that this bar doesn't come with everything to install it. They are wrong.
customer_reviews.text: In spite of people saying that this bar doesn't come with everything to install it, this super strong stainless grab bar came with everything you need to install it! No extra parts or purchases necessary. The bar is super strong stainless and works great in our tiled shower/tub.
customer_reviews.author: notagoddess

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Grab Bar
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bar. Easy to install between studs. You will need a ceramic drill bit to get through you shower tile. I also recommend caullking the installation area and screws before covering up with base cover. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: AmaniSofia

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own screws
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been able to use it. Even predrilling as instructed, the screws won’t stop stripping. Had to switch to deck screws and washers.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Needs anchors, not included
customer_reviews.text: Great video on how to install....NEGLECTED to mention special anchor hardware NOT included!!!! lucky for me, handyman knew to get parts at home depot....otherwise....great item...priced deceptive ...anchors not cheap
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN SANDS

customer_reviews.title: its sturdy but need to install it and make sure you hit studs.
customer_reviews.text: its a great product but its not something you can install that easy. I installed in my dads bathroom. its 24 inches and studs in the wall are usually 16 inch so its hard to put straight. I had to use stud finder and put it on a angle for my dad. its ok both hit a stud just awkward postioned. not sure if its going to help my dads hows handicapped.
customer_reviews.author: shadow143

customer_reviews.title: White color surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came as a white color? The other one was 4 feet and stainless in color. Have returned the white. Waiting with eager anticipation to see if the next one comes white or stainless. The install went great. The writing says those moen toggle bolt things are extra cost. They are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Norman S. Stickney III

customer_reviews.title: Medical grade
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them. Two 24" ones and one 18" and all three were medical grade. The 18" one ever so slightly thinner than the 24" (thinner as far as diameter when you wrap your hand around it, not thinner as in quality of the metal) All of them worked perfectly for what we needed. I like that all hardware and installation instruction pamphlet were included
customer_reviews.author: JilSpan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these more than once.
customer_reviews.text: Had knee replacement then fell and broke my leg had to have ankle surgery. These bars were installed in and outside my shower. They REALLY helped me through a rough time. Excellent quality, very sturdy, feel safe using them even now when I no longer need them I still use them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: T. GOODRICH

customer_reviews.title: great looking.
customer_reviews.text: great looking .... must mount on wood .... else you will need mounting kit sold separately .. $$$ ... miss leading watching the installation video
customer_reviews.author: R Saulnier

customer_reviews.title: This bar is perfect for the bathroom!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this grabber bar installed in my main bathroom and it works very well. It is very strong and stable attached to tile. I did not use any suction cups, it was professionally attached to tile in bathroom. It keeps me from falling!!! I could not ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sheet metal screws stripped on installation
customer_reviews.text: The supplier provides six long screws, three for each end. A difficult installation required a manual philips-head screwdriver.. Two of the six screws were stripped in the process; the metal was cheap and I spent an hour searching for replacement screws. The grab bar should at least include an extra couple of screws, if not better ones,
customer_reviews.author: NYWriter

customer_reviews.title: Moen 8724 Home 24-Inch Bathroom Grab Bar, Stainless
customer_reviews.text: Extra purchase to match - 100 % - the grab bars we have in bathroom. Plan to use the Moen Grab Bars to replace the ordinary towel bars. Should have insisted contractor install Moen Grab Bars instead - the Moen Grab Bar provided stability for my father. BIG THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Gregg A. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Important Safety Product for my Elderly Father
customer_reviews.text: I installed these bars in my Dad's shower (despite his objections that he didn't need them). They have been serving him well and I feel a lot more confident in his safety in the shower with these rails. They are well made, strong, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Very secure craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, steady holds probally up to 400 lbs. Screws in to wood but you can sub bolts and nuts. One of the best purchases I have made. Very secure and serves multiple purposes. Just gets better every day. Have had for a year, has helped me many times, cost savings in preventable falls and slips...over $100,000 and several lives.
customer_reviews.author: David Pagel

customer_reviews.title: Look great, strong and bolted into studs, they are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: No downsides to this at all. I got it for my slippery new granite shower. They look and work very well. We had this installed at the same time the granite went in, but since they are meant to hold a lot of weight in case of a fall, you definitely want to make sure they are screwed into a wall stud, not just drywall or cement board. They do not show water stains, something that I was concerned about. Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Old AliceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: 32" grab bars are hard to find.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a 32" grab bar so I could anchor in studs at both ends of a horizontal bar. Received next day so saved me a trip to the big box store where they don't carry 32". Bar is same quality as any other Moen but size I wanted and got it quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Best in the Industry
customer_reviews.text: There are many grab bars on the market, and most of them are probably good. This one is special in that it guarantees 3 fasteners in each stud. No other that I know of can match this. Your favorite elephant could not break this one loose.
customer_reviews.author: Francene H.

customer_reviews.title: Rails help to get up off toilet with ease.
customer_reviews.text: Both rails were easy to install. Only had to put in one anchor. Was even lucky enough to find the 1 1/4" hole saw on sale. The other 3 were screwed into wood studs. I highly recommend this product if you are in need of a pair of rails.
customer_reviews.author: T. Malley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and even better mounted where needed. If you need safety grab bars, get one of these Moen stainless bars in this length or another. Don't put off, purchase it and have it installed as soon as it arrives with long stainless screws going into studs and providing safety where accidents are most likely to happen with damp or wet floors.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING HAND RAIL looks good and easy to wipe water spots off
customer_reviews.text: Installed by my husband with a professional contractor looking on and I am finally able to feel secure entering the tub/shower for a relaxing shower. This bar is secure and very stable feeling when I use it to enter tub/shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful for the Mobility Challenged
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy and well built. I would buy from this vendor again. I am grateful to find a 48 inch length grab bar. It is positioned at the outside wall going to the front door. I myself used this bar to get into the house and we have friends that appreciate having this help to get into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sharen Sleater

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Requires expert installation.
customer_reviews.text: These grab bars are great for elderly or handicapped. Make sure you install correctly for the situation. For example I recently installed 3 in one bathroom and each one required different hardware for the point of install.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Layman

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice, nice addition to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Moen comes through again. Elderly mother required additional bars in the bathroom once installed, used it daily. Now my family depends on the stability it provides . Strong, stable and built to last. Thanks to sellers who did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: altius

customer_reviews.title: which is SO MUCH better than having to fool around with expensive brackets and ...
customer_reviews.text: You really cannot beat this grab bar for the price. The beauty of the 32" bar is you can install it horizontally in two studs, which is SO MUCH better than having to fool around with expensive brackets and hangers. I just can't emphasize how much better, easier and less expensive that makes your installation.
customer_reviews.author: Al BeBack

customer_reviews.title: I  feel much safer getting in and out of the shower or tub.
customer_reviews.text: I have an inner ear disorder that affects my balance. I purchased this grab bar and a shorter one. My friend installed them both (he said it was very easy). It's nice to have something to hold when I get wobbly in the shower, and also useful for getting out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Januros

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a long bar, and this was what was available. Price is great over the box stores. Would rather it had some form of grippy surface for hands.
customer_reviews.author: dws

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy and makes taking showers much safer.
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it looks and that it came with all the parts necessary for a family member to affix it to the wall. Ordered two and they are holding up very well and look strong and good with the bathroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H. Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Great grip and more safe for personal use in home
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and appreciate the smaller diameter as I have small hands. Great grip and more safe for personal use in home. I have them in both showers and around both commodes. Even guests without physical limitations say they appreciate the added safety features in case they lose their balance, esp in a shower. Moen products have proven to be long lasting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Must be installed correctly.
customer_reviews.text: There is no suction power as they are attached to the wall in the studs. Sturdy enough my son lifted himself up with mine and it held him. He’s about 190 I guess. Put another in a shower for my husband. Advised by his doctor as he is at risk for falls.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Y

customer_reviews.title: Great prices and sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Looks so expensive. Fit perfect as a safety grab bar in my new shower. I used one outside shower for getting in and out too. Quality all the way. So much better price than the home improvement stores. Found more size options here as well. Loved the prices.
customer_reviews.author: K nurse

customer_reviews.title: Eldery Security
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my elderly mother-in-law. She is a fall hazard. I mounted it outside the shower, into the wall studs. The installation only took 15 mins (if you are reasonably handy with a drill and screws) They are VERY secure and she is very, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A marvelous addition to my shower
customer_reviews.text: I called a pro to come install these, and I'm so very happy with the results. Older people have a hard time getting into and out of a shower, and it's very nice to have something solid to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn165

customer_reviews.title: Great for support, a little bit difficult to install through tile.
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice and sturdy which is exactly what we needed. I actually installed it in my father’s shower as he needs the help standing up and moving around. My only complaint which isn’t the support bAr itself is I had to go through the shower tile to install it which meant I had to buy more tools in order to properly drill through the tile. Overall it was a great buy and I would recommend it to my clients as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Raises the Bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar is very sturdy and will support up to 300 pounds. I have an elderly relative who needed this bar and I had a carpenter install it in that person’s shower stall. Talk about a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: BeatleBangs1964

customer_reviews.title: This is a 1.25" x 48" bar just as described.
customer_reviews.text: This is a long bar and small around it is 1.25" so perfect it is for my grandson who has small hands. Many of the grab bars are 1.50" and that makes a surprising amount of difference. I have ordered some in the past that said 1.25 but were 1.50 when they arrived. These are true to size and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Delia M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I put this next to my toilet to help myself get up and down after back surgery. Bar was easy to install just hit two studs the screws are included. Looks very nice in stainless and is rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Albert

customer_reviews.title: Installed correctly this should do the trick
customer_reviews.text: We don't know how this will work in the moment of truth, so to speak, but I love the safety and security it gives us to have it there. There are 6 screws, and each screw is supposed to hold 75 pounds, so that should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Needed for short staircase as required by building code for safety. Used outside and was a great alternative to a wooden railing. Much more economical and can be installed with just a couple screws.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Najarro

customer_reviews.title: Great stability aid.
customer_reviews.text: A great stability aid but not intended to use to support entire weight. That could actually be dangerous. Very helpful entering and exiting tub or when used as a stability aid in tub/shower.
customer_reviews.author: dlh

customer_reviews.title: We like this grab bar a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is mounted against drywall on both ends, the thing seems super strong! The mounting system used by Moen seems very well designed to insure high strength and durability even when no wall studs are available nearby..
customer_reviews.author: shansen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My son installed this bar close to a shower for easy and secure exit from the shower. The installation was easy but following the well written and diagramed instructions is important.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: The length of the rod
customer_reviews.text: Before you make a purchase, make sure it will fit your wall, if you are on a wallboard with studs. I did not do that and found that I needed to purchase those moly screws to secure the rod to the wallboard. If you lean too hard on the rod it might come off the wall. Finding the studs is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Rickety

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Most quality grab bars work equally well. It is important that each wall attachment has some kind of backing to give it strength. This grab bar is attractive and I love the stainless finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jayebee

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.  Can not shower without them.
customer_reviews.text: I had my contractor install these because my shower is porcelain tile. He seemed to have no problem installing them. I will put them in my other bathroom soon. They are sturdy and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed these yet because I want them to be installed correctly and not pull out from the wall if my wife starts to fall. They look and feel like the ones you see in handicap restrooms.
customer_reviews.author: NewTech

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty design. I always want to drill into studs, so buy a stud finder, or borrow one. Yes the video shows the Securemount anchors, but the grab bar itself says, “comes with secure mount design.” The design is the various spacing holes at the ends of the bars. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product when correctly installed.
customer_reviews.text: Installation may require special tools such as a diamond hole-saw bit to drill through ceramic tile. Also, find and refer to the applicable building codes and ADA guidelines for the proper placement of grab bars (not supplied with the product).
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Metz

customer_reviews.title: Safety Number One!
customer_reviews.text: I have installed so many of them, and suggested to friends and family. However, the screws provided in package are junk. The heads gets stripped very easily, either I have to remember not to use them ahead of time, or end up cutting them with carbide saw.
customer_reviews.author: Big*Day

customer_reviews.title: Cheap screws for a MOEN product
customer_reviews.text: The screws got stripped putting into wall. NOW WE CAN'T GET THE SCREW OUT. STRIPPED. SOOO MAD. MY DAD NEEDS IT IN The BATHROOM, and now we're stuck with this. Errrr
customer_reviews.author: S. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Need a special kit to install- not included
customer_reviews.text: Description doesn't tell you that you need a special kit to install, which costs more than the bar did. Once we got the kit and got this installed, it is very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

product_meta.title: Moen 8732 Home 32-Inch Bathroom Grab Bar, Stainless
product_meta.description:
Size:32 InchEnjoy greater peace of mind in the bathroom with the Moen 32-Inch Grab Bar. This ADA grab bar supports up to 500 pounds and provides a reliable handhold whether you're showering, bathing, or using the toilet. It also features a Secure Mount design that allows for easy, secure installation at any angle. And thanks to its durable stainless steel construction, this bath grip provides lasting performance and blends seamlessly with almost any interior decor. From the Manufacturer Moen SecureMount Stainless 32-Inch grab bar delivers a lightly brushed warm grey metallic look. It is ADA compliant and comes with a limited lifetime warranty. A Genuine Moen Product. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Moen SecureMount Stainless 32-Inch grab bar delivers a lightly brushed warm grey metallic look. It is ADA compliant and comes with a limited lifetime warranty. A Genuine Moen Product. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.
feature_bullets: COORDINATING FINISH: Stainless finish coordinates with today's popular kitchen appliances and accessories
SUPPORTIVE DESIGN: Bathroom grab bar supports up to 500 lbs when installed in a stug or when using SecureMounts (not included)
SAFE AND SECURE: SecureMount design for easy, secure installation (sold separately)
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,889 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
